## Causal Inference with Machine Learning
<div class="br2"></div>

- MIT 14.388: Inference on Causal and Structural Parameters Using ML and AI in the Department of Economics at MIT taught by Professor Victor Chernozukhov
  - [R Website](https://d2cml-ai.github.io/14.388_r/intro.html){target="_blank"}
  - [Python Website](https://d2cml-ai.github.io/14.388_py/intro.html){target="_blank"}
  - [Julia Website](https://d2cml-ai.github.io/14.388_jl/intro.html){target="_blank"}

  - [Website](https://d2cml-ai.github.io/mgtecon634_py/md/intro.html){target="_blank"}
<div class="br2"></div>

- Causal Inference and Machine Learning in Practice with EconML and CausalML: Industrial Use Cases at Microsoft, TripAdvisor, Uber
